sentences.en: Act uprightly and despise calumny. Dirt may stick to a mud wall , but not polish'd marble.
sentences.cn: 为人正直的就不惧诽谤: 污物可以沾到泥墙上, 却附不上光滑的大理石.

sentences.en: Calumny is answered best with silence.
He was the victim of calumny.
Never lead a ready ear to calumny.
No flame rises without smoke, no fame without calumny.
sentences.cn: 无烟不起火, 无毁不成名.

sentences.en: Question history , and learn how all the defenders of liberty in all times, have by calumny.
sentences.cn: 只要向历史请教一下,你便可以看到,在各个时代, 所有自由的卫士是怎样受尽诽谤的.

sentences.en: This a groundless, vicious slander and a grave calumny on the Chinese people and Chinese scientists.
sentences.cn: 这是毫无根据的恶意中伤,是对中国人民和中国科学家的极大诬蔑.

sentences.en: Your calumny against the great is impious.
sentences.cn: 你对伟人的中伤有失虔敬.
